summary: Led by British officers, partisans on Crete plan to kidnap the island's German commander and smuggle him to Cairo, Egypt to embarrass the occupiers.
cast: Dirk Bogarde|Marius Goring|David Oxley|Dimitri Andreas|Cyril Cusack|Laurence Payne|Wolfe Morris|Michael Gough|John Cairney|Brian Worth|Roland Bartrop|George Eugeniou|Paul Stassino|Adeeb Assaly|Theo Moreas|Takis Frangofinos|Christopher Lee|Peter Augustine|John Houseman|Phyllia Houseman|Gisela Birke|Peter Brace|E.V.H. Emmett|Guido Lorraine|Andreas Malandrinos|Howard Marion-Crawford|Richard Marner|David McCallum|George Pravda|Christopher Rhodes|Peter Swanwick
title: Emboscada nocturna
